price: ហើយក្នុងចំណោមភស្ដុតាងទាំងឡាយរបស់ទ្រង់នោះដែរ គឺសំពៅដ៏ធំដែលធ្វើដំណើរនៅលើផ្ទៃសមុទ្រប្រៀបដូចជាភ្នំ។
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
